Back to Johannes Brahms

Johannes Brahms

Variations on a Theme by Paganini, op. 35

1863

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 24'

  • 1. Book 1
  • 2. Book 2

In each book, the theme, the last of Nicolò Paganini’s twenty-four caprices (op. 1 no. 24), is followed by fourteen variations.

Recommended editions

  • Neue-Brahms Ausgabe (Henle) · III/5 [in preparation]
  • Henle · HN 440 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Margit McCorkle / Sonja Gerlach / Hans Kann / Ernst Herttrich
  • Henle · HN 394 · ed. Hans Kann
  • Könemann · K 115 · Variationen · ed. Enikő Gyenge
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50172 · ed. Johannes Behr

1. Book 1

Duration: 13' 30"

Difficulty: 5

2. Book 2

Duration: 10' 30"

Difficulty: 5
